description: Verification Order required for the confirmation of the numbering and description of the newly developed residential units at 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LB, linked to Planning aplications PP/16/01341 & PP/19/05695, as follows:Flat 2.1, Second Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFlat 2.2, Second Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFlat 2.3, Second Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFlat 3.1, Third Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFlat 3.2, Third Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFlat 3.3, Third Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFlat 3.4, Third Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate W11 3LBFormer residential units Flat 2, Second Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate, London, W11 3LB &Flat 3, Third Floor, 139 Notting Hill Gate, London, W11 3LB, to be deleted.
